'''Rise and Shrine''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to interact with all of the five [[Shrines of Yashiori Island]] around Yashiori Island (not counting the [[Outsider Shrine]]).
